title: NDL Koten OCR Lite Next.js Edition
subtitle: This app is a Next.js port of NDL Koten OCR-lite.

header.title: NDL Koten OCR
header.subtitle: High-precision Japanese classical text recognition system using AI technology

processingMode.title: Processing Method
processingMode.clientDescription: Execute OCR processing in the browser (Private, initial loading time required)
processingMode.serverDescription: Execute OCR processing on the server (Fast, available as API)

iiif.noImagesFound: No images found in this manifest
iiif.fetchError: Failed to fetch or convert IIIF manifest: {{error}}

fileUpload.dragDropText: Drag & drop images or click to select
fileUpload.supportedFormats: Supported formats: PNG, JPEG, GIF, WebP

processing.processingError: An error occurred during image processing
processing.serverProcessingError: An error occurred during server-side image processing: {{error}}
processing.iiifProcessingError: An error occurred during IIIF image processing: {{error}}

footer.description: This application is a web port of
footer.developer: Developer: Yuta Hashimoto (National Museum of Japanese History,
footer.nextjsDeveloper: Next.js version by: Satoru Nakamura (University of Tokyo,

api.title: NDL Koten OCR API Documentation
api.subtitle: RESTful API for Japanese Classical Text OCR

overview.title: Documentation Overview
overview.description: List of TEI XML schema files and documentation used in NDL Koten OCR Lite Next.js Edition. These files define the output format of classical Japanese OCR and ensure interoperability.

teiSchema.title: TEI Schema Files
teiSchema.description: TEI XML schema definition files used for NDL Koten OCR output. Written in ODD (One Document Does it all) format and also converted to RelaxNG format.

htmlDocs.title: HTML Documentation
htmlDocs.description: Detailed explanations and reference documentation for TEI schema. Includes descriptions of elements and attributes, usage examples, etc. Formatted with modern styles for easy reading.

styleResources.title: Style Resources
styleResources.description: Modern CSS stylesheet for TEI HTML documents. Features dark mode support, responsive design, print optimization, and more.

usageExamples.title: Usage & Examples
usageExamples.description: Specific usage instructions and sample files for schema files and stylesheets.

schemaFormats.title: Schema Formats
schemaFormats.odd: TEI One Document Does it all format

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: For inquiries about NDL Koten OCR Lite Next.js Edition, please contact us at
contact.baseSystemName: NDL Koten OCR-lite by Yuta Hashimoto (National Museum of Japanese History)
